content: वद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (वदति, but <ab>Atm.</ab> in certain senses and with certain prepositions; see below; उवाद, अवादीत्, वदिष्यति, वदितुं, उदित; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} उद्यते, {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} विवदिषति) {@--1@} To say, speak, utter, address, speak to; वद प्रदोषे स्फुटचंद्रतारका विभावरी यद्यरुणाय कल्पते <ls>Ku. 5. 44</ls>; वदतां वरः <ls>R. 1. 59</ls> ‘the foremost of the eloquent’. {@--2@} To announce, tell, communicate, inform; यो गोत्रादि वदति स्वयं. {@--3@} To speak of, describe; <ls>Bg. 2. 29.</ls> {@--4@} To lay down, state; <ls>Ms. 2. 9</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 14.</ls> {@--5@} To name, call; वदंति वर्ण्यावर्ण्यानां धर्मैक्यं दीपकं बुधाः <ls>Chandr. 5. 45</ls>; तदप्यपाकीर्णमतः प्रियंवदां वदंत्यपर्णेति च तां पुराविदः <ls>Ku. 5. 28.</ls> {@--6@} To indicate, bespeak; कृतज्ञतामस्य वदंति संपदः <ls>Ki. 1. 14.</ls> {@--7@} To raise the voice, utter a cry, sing; कोकिलः पंचमेत वदति; वदंति मधुरा वाचः &c. {@--8@} To show brilliance or proficiency in, be an authority on (<ab>Atm.</ab>); शास्त्रे वदते <ls>Sk.</ls>, पणिनिर्वदते <ls>Vop.</ls> {@--9@} To shine, look splendid or bright (<ab>Atm.</ab>); <ls>Bk. 8. 27.</ls> {@--10@} To maintain, affirm. {@--11@} To toil, exert, labour (<ab>Atm.</ab>); क्षेत्रे वदते <ls>Sk.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (वादयति, ते) {@--1@} To cause to speak or say. {@--2@} To cause to sound, play on a musical instrument; वीणामिव वादयंती <ls>Vikr. 1. 10</ls>; वादयते मृदु वेणुं <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--3@} To speak, recite.
